text: Yes, It is not a problem in those cases as code is being added with time :slightly_smiling_face: But, it is dangerous that people can start publishing packages after adding meaningful code in it.

elements.text: Yes, It is not a problem in those cases as code is being added with time
But, it is dangerous that people can start publishing packages after adding meaningful code in it.

text: I mean, people can add dangerous code at any time
